Name: Welcome To... Chichester OVN 1 : The Beach
About the game: About This Game The Welcome To... Chichester series is set in a semi-fictional world where secret organisations covertly battle each other for ideological supremacy. This is the first in a trilogy of stories that are separate from the main series. The Story Taking place on the unluckiest day of the year, the protagonist and his/her friends get an invite to 'The Beach'. Mistaking this for a private beach party, they are sorely disappointed when instead of lounging around, everyone ends up having to search for three parts of a missing sword at a lonely, haunted bungalow. Events become more complicated when two unwanted characters turn up. This is a short side-story to the Welcome To... Chichester series. It would be preferable to have played the previous episodes first. Features include : Gender selection. Play as a male or female protagonist. Dialogue can change depending on gender Mac version included Updated story Internal and Steam achievements - can you find them all ? Characters Cindi Eglantine Looking forward to relaxing Grendel Jinx Wants to buy something cute Hotel Receptionist Not very happy when computer problems strike Hotel Waitress Allergic to cats Hebkya Forced to help search for various sword parts, along with Misericordia Misericordia Forced to help search for various sword parts, along with Hebkya
